comments.body: I am SO HAPPY to see this change.  Now rename etcdgeneric and rename all of the pkg/registry/*/etcd to something else :)  I don't want to see "etcd" anywhere in the code base outside of one or two packages that implement our storage API in terms of etcd.
Sure - I would like to do it, but I would like to implement the watch in apiserver first. But I'm happy to make this change after that (or during hanging on code review).
BTW - @thockin do you have any proposal what names those should have (I'm very bad in "inventing" names)

You're asking the guy who chose "lmctfy" for naming advice?

On Mon, Aug 3, 2015 at 12:53 AM, Wojciech Tyczynski <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> In pkg/registry/endpoint/etcd/etcd.go
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/11806#discussion_r36062802
> :
> 
> > @@ -33,7 +33,7 @@ type REST struct {
> >  }
> > 
> >  // NewStorage returns a RESTStorage object that will work against endpoints.
> > -func NewStorage(h tools.EtcdHelper) *REST {
> > +func NewStorage(s tools.StorageInterface) *REST {
> 
> BTW - @thockin https://github.com/thockin do you have any proposal what
> names those should have (I'm very bad in "inventing" names)
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/11806/files#r36062802
> .

:-)
But I don't think I would come up with a better name. So any suggestions are appreciated anyway :)
